TopicTitle: Radioactive - A short Kerbal story to music

Articles.Content: When a radioactive asteroid is about to hit Kerbin, a single Kerbal will steal, crash, rebuild and sleep on moderately cold and dusty floors to save all of Kerbalkind.

This is..Amazing.

Like insanely amazing. Take ALL the rep, ALL OF IT.

I was having a suckish day due to the passing away of a animator I've followed since I was younger, and generally have a poor day, but this has just made everything better. +100 everything.

Like, actually bro, you just made my day.

Do moar!!!!
Yes, take ALL of the rep. Thoroughly enjoyed that.
Thanks for the kind words and rep everyone, is much appreciated!
And Germany is denied to access the video for the usual reasons ...
